channel.title: 华尔街日报
channel.description: 这是一个追踪华尔街日报news的种子

item.title: 镶板木质天花板赋予房间个性和温暖，一位设计师将其比喻为一个拥抱。我们与专家探讨了其中的奥妙。
item.description: A paneled wood ceiling gives a room character and warmth that one designer likens to a hug. We discussed the ins and outs with the experts. on.wsj.com/3OAEHEi on.wsj.com/3OAEHEi

item.title: 安德烈-阿加西曾经是世界上最伟大的网球运动员，现在他有了一项新的最爱球拍类运动。在这里，他谈到了皮球运动、他珍爱的项链和他的每周例行活动。
item.description: Once the world’s greatest tennis player, Andre Agassi has a new favorite racquet sport. Here, he talks about playing pickleball, the necklace he treasures and his weekly routines. on.wsj.com/3HIU0qz on.wsj.com/3HIU0qz

item.title: 童子军受害者要求最高法院在普渡制药公司的类似破产计划做出裁决之前停止支付和解金
item.description: Boy Scouts victims are asking the Supreme Court to halt settlement payments until Purdue Pharma’s similar bankruptcy plan is decided on.wsj.com/49kYJec on.wsj.com/49kYJec

item.title: 由于早期迹象表明，被监禁的前总理伊姆兰-汗的政党出人意料地表现强劲，选举结果被推迟，手机服务仍然暂停，一场动荡的选举又被推上了风口浪尖。
item.description: A turbulent election was thrown into further question as results were delayed and cellphone service remained suspended amid early indications of a surprisingly strong showing by the party of jailed former Prime Minister Imran Khan on.wsj.com/3SRGtDu on.wsj.com/3SRGtDu

item.title: 如果一袋 Chex Mix 在新奥尔良机场的价格是 3.49 美元，那么在拉瓜迪亚机场怎么会是 9.99 美元？互联网对机场零食的高价进行了比较和质疑
item.description: If a bag of Chex Mix costs $3.49 at the airport in New Orleans, how is it $9.99 at LaGuardia? The internet has come together to compare—and question—the high price of snacks at airports on.wsj.com/3STLc7X on.wsj.com/3STLc7X

item.title: 当许多美国城市正在为大量新移民的到来而苦苦挣扎时，堪萨斯州托皮卡正在邀请所有获准在美国工作的人前来工作
item.description: While many American cities are struggling with large numbers of newly arrived migrants, Topeka, Kan. is inviting anyone and everyone with permission to work in the U.S. to come its way on.wsj.com/3whJCne on.wsj.com/3whJCne

item.title: 弗拉基米尔-普京（Vladimir Putin）表示，换俘可能会导致《华尔街日报》记者埃文-格什科维奇（Evan Gershkovich）获释，但拒绝透露获释的时间框架
item.description: Vladimir Putin said a prisoner exchange would probably lead to the release of Wall Street Journal reporter Evan Gershkovich but declined to give a time frame for the release on.wsj.com/3Uyk7YW on.wsj.com/3Uyk7YW

item.title: "有人会加奶油，但我觉得太重了。朱丽叶-比诺什（Juliette Binoche）对制作煎蛋卷有自己的看法，对其他大多数烹饪问题也是如此。一起来看看这位奥斯卡获奖女演员在巴黎设备齐全的厨房吧。
item.description: “Some people add cream, but I think it's too heavy.” Juliette Binoche has opinions on making omelets—and on most other matters culinary, too. Take a peek inside the Oscar-winning actress's well-equipped Paris kitchen. on.wsj.com/3SNtLWp on.wsj.com/3SNtLWp

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：没有人命令退休消防员在 9/11 事件发生的那一周前往零点报到。但鲍勃-贝克维斯出现了，就像自建国以来普通美国人在国家紧急时刻所做的那样，@KarlRove 写道。
item.description: From @WSJopinion: No one ordered retired firefighters to report to Ground Zero the week of 9/11. But Bob Beckwith showed up, just as ordinary Americans have done in urgent moments for our country since its founding, writes @KarlRove. on.wsj.com/4bwrPck

item.title: 他们的家拥有水景和沙滩，而且离大海很远
item.description: Their home has water views and a sandy beach—and it’s nowhere near the ocean on.wsj.com/498WMRY on.wsj.com/498WMRY

item.title: "私募股权》是一本关于在残酷、高风险的顶级对冲基金世界工作的新回忆录。点击此处阅读节选。
item.description: "Private Equity" is a new memoir about working in the cutthroat, high-risk world of top hedge funds. Read an excerpt here. on.wsj.com/42BJmLZ on.wsj.com/42BJmLZ

item.title: 当公开批评俄罗斯领导人乌克兰战争的少数声音之一被取消即将举行的总统选举资格时，弗拉基米尔-普京的反对者的空间又缩小了一点
item.description: The space for Vladimir Putin’s opponents shrank a little more when one of the few voices openly criticizing the Russian leader’s war in Ukraine was disqualified from the coming presidential election on.wsj.com/48jcmtq on.wsj.com/48jcmtq

item.title: 不要再用赤霞珠搭配巧克力了。这些葡萄酒与巧克力棒和巧克力糖的搭配要好得多。
item.description: Stop pairing Cabernet with chocolate. These wines make far better matches for your bars and bonbons. on.wsj.com/42CJ6fJ on.wsj.com/42CJ6fJ

item.title: 尼加拉瓜专制政府已向被判犯有洗钱罪的巴拿马前总统提供庇护，这是该地区第三位在马那瓜避难的前领导人。
item.description: Nicaragua’s authoritarian government has granted asylum to a former Panamanian president convicted of money laundering, the third former leader from the region to find refuge in Managua on.wsj.com/3OB1BeR on.wsj.com/3OB1BeR

item.title: 今年 1 月是有记录以来最热的月份，首次使地球 12 个月的平均气温超过了具有里程碑意义的《巴黎协定》的一个关键临界值
item.description: This January was the warmest on record, for the first time pushing Earth's 12-month average temperatures over a key threshold of the landmark Paris accord on.wsj.com/42ARtbB on.wsj.com/42ARtbB

item.title: 拜登政府认为仍有可能促成沙特阿拉伯和以色列之间历史性的正常化协议，但随着加沙战事仍在进行，窗口期正在关闭
item.description: The Biden administration believes it is still possible to broker a historic normalization deal between Saudi Arabia and Israel, but the window is closing with fighting still under way in Gaza on.wsj.com/3OZYGwD on.wsj.com/3OZYGwD

item.title: 来自@WSJopinion：毛拉毫不客气地折断了拜登和他的外交官们伸出的每一根橄榄枝。Mike_Pence 和 @mikepompeo 写道：现在已经到了接受这种做法已经彻底失败并让美国人付出生命代价的时候了。
item.description:
From @WSJopinion: The mullahs have unceremoniously snapped every olive branch Biden and his diplomats extended. It is past time to accept that this approach has utterly failed and cost American lives, write @Mike_Pence and @mikepompeo.
on.wsj.com/49tyiml

item.title: 本季，时装设计师们用闪亮的流苏、色彩斑斓的刺绣和出人意料的比例展现了新的工艺精神。让我们一起来发现本季的亮点。
item.description: This season, fashion designers embrace a new spirit of craft with sparkly fringe, colorful embroideries and unexpected proportions. Discover the standout moments. on.wsj.com/3uCt5K6 on.wsj.com/3uCt5K6

item.title: 如果您来到世界贵宾选择之都，并同意尝试所有的升级销售，会怎么样？旅游记者 @DawnGilbertson 对拉斯维加斯的每一次升级都说 "好"。一个主题 👇
item.description:
What if you went to the world capital of VIP options and agreed to try all the upsells? Travel reporter @DawnGilbertson said "yes" to every upgrade in Las Vegas. A thread 👇
on.wsj.com/3w94EVl twitter.com/DawnGilbertson/s…

item.title: 泰勒-斯威夫特（Taylor Swift）的粉丝们正在为下周的超级碗比赛筹划观赛派对、制作友谊手链和主题零食。有人想吃 "猪在空白空间"（Pigs in a Blank-et Space）吗？
item.description: Taylor Swift fans are planning watch parties, making friendship bracelets and dreaming up themed snacks for the Super Bowl next week. Pigs in a Blank-et Space, anyone? on.wsj.com/493AEIQ

item.title: 民主党控制的参议院为通过一项旨在加强乌克兰、以色列和其他盟国的法案扫清了关键障碍
item.description: The Democratic-controlled Senate cleared a critical hurdle toward passing a bill aimed at fortifying Ukraine, Israel and other allies on.wsj.com/42AeiMz on.wsj.com/42AeiMz

item.title: 联邦存款保险公司（Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.
item.description: The Federal Deposit Insurance Corp.’s human-resources operation has an HR problem: The two departments charged with addressing employees’ complaints of harassment and discrimination have long been beset by their own allegations of misconduct on.wsj.com/49uEzhU

item.title: 拉斯维加斯转变为全球体育中心，反映了沙特阿拉伯为提升其全球形象而掀起的体育狂潮
item.description: The transformation of Las Vegas into a global sports hub mirrors the sports-fueled binge that Saudi Arabia has used to enhance its global profile on.wsj.com/3Ux6Lw2 on.wsj.com/3Ux6Lw2

item.title: 美国联邦通信委员会（FCC）已经取缔了由人工智能发出声音的未经请求的机器人电话，因为人们越来越担心这种技术会被用来欺骗或误导他人。
item.description: The FCC has outlawed unsolicited robocalls with voices generated by artificial intelligence amid growing concerns the technology can be used to deceive or mislead people on.wsj.com/3OD8zjl on.wsj.com/3OD8zjl

item.title: 重大新闻：乌克兰总统沃洛德梅尔-泽连斯基（Volodymyr Zelensky）罢免了他的高级将领，这是乌克兰领导层自俄罗斯入侵以来最重大的一次调整
item.description: Breaking: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky ousted his top general in the most significant shake-up of the country’s leadership since the Russian invasion began on.wsj.com/3uoaJwz on.wsj.com/3uoaJwz

item.title: 美国无人机空袭炸死了一名伊朗支持的伊拉克民兵指挥官，有可能进一步恶化与巴格达的关系
item.description: The U.S. drone strike that killed an Iran-backed militia commander in Iraq risks further straining relations with Baghdad on.wsj.com/3SR63IS on.wsj.com/3SR63IS

item.title: 长期以来，移民政治一直是国会山的毒瘤，而迫在眉睫的特朗普-拜登复选更不可能达成妥协。
item.description: Immigration politics have long been toxic on Capitol Hill, and the looming Trump-Biden rematch made compromise even more unlikely. on.wsj.com/484i02k on.wsj.com/484i02k

item.title: 凯特琳-克拉克（Caitlin Clark）已接近美国大学生篮球联赛（NCAA）女子篮球职业生涯得分纪录，但一些著名教练表示，真正的纪录还没有被打破。
item.description: Caitlin Clark is close to the NCAA women’s basketball career scoring record, but some prominent coaches say the true mark is yet to be broken on.wsj.com/498THBw on.wsj.com/498THBw

item.title: 羞于进来。待在家里会蒙羞。生病的工人赢不了
item.description: Shamed for coming in. Shamed for staying home. Sick workers can’t win. on.wsj.com/489lLn1 on.wsj.com/489lLn1

item.title: 来自 @WSJopinion：第 14 条修正案第 3 款取消了某些 "参与叛乱 "的前公职人员的资格，该条款是否适用于总统职位？答案是否定的，@DavidRivkin 和 Lee A. Casey 写道
item.description: From @WSJopinion: Does Section 3 of the 14th Amendment, which disqualifies certain former officeholders who have “engaged in insurrection,” apply to the presidency? The answer is no, write @DavidRivkin and  Lee A. Casey on.wsj.com/3SOxqmY
